description: You awaken in a decaying log cabin deep in the woods. A storm rages outside. The smell of mildew and something metallic fills the air.

rooms.description: A flickering candle casts shadows across the warped floorboards. A locked door creaks in the wind.
Dust and cobwebs blanket old furniture. A cracked mirror reflects your pale face.
Moisture drips from the ceiling. Rusted chains hang from the walls.
